name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speak, Translate And See with AWS

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Amazon Web Services (AWS) AI Services (Amazon Polly, Translate and Rekognition) on the browser easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows users to try AWS AI services easily while interacting the page they view.

* Listen the selected text with Amazon Polly
* Translate the selected to another language (English, German, French, Italian, Spanish and Turkish) with Amazon Translate
* Read Authy tokens to input fields using Amazon Rekognition
* Detect text in an image in the page using Amazon Rekognition

Actions are triggered by right click. You can access commands in the context menu.

After you installed the extension, you should enter your AWS credentials by clicking the page action 'Set AWS Credentials' in the Chrome toolbar. Enter your AWS Access Key, Secret Access Key and select your AWS region. Please note that you should give minimum permissions for the credentials you have specified for Amazon Polly, Translate and Rekognition and you should keep your credentials private.

For more information, https://github.com/ceyhunozgun/awsAIChromeExtension/wiki
